about_the_game:
Versatility is what the Casual Wear Set is all about!

This pack contains 44 sets of clothing, divided equally between male and female. A large variety of clothing is provided, ranging from skirt fashions to long-sleeve styles to camouflage outfits! You can use these outfits for scenes that take place outside of school, where your uniform-free characters are able to relax and express their personality. Let their looks shine with unique styles and favorite colors. These classic styles can also be used for older or younger supporting characters, as they are appropriate for many walks of life.

This pack contains:
  • 22 types of male clothing.
  • 22 types of female clothing.
  • Skirts, long-sleeve shirts, sweaters, camouflage and more!

name: ComiPo! Casual Wear

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: MicrosoftR Windows 8.1 (64-bit) / 10 (64-bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 256 MB or more, Pixel Shader 2.0 or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
